answers.answer: Take a deep breath, it's all going to be ok! Lots of ppl fail the one hour glucose test and pass the three hour. It could be that you didn't eat enough before or ate to much or really anything. Even if you don't pass the three hour test, there are new guidelines and precautions to take but the doctors know what they're doing and it will be ok!
Even if u do fail, it's better for u and safer for baby if u know! Knowledge is power! There are far worse complications to have, diabetes is quite common
I failed the 1 hour test with 150, but passed the 3 hour test. It is more of a pain to so the 3 hour, but majority of people pass it. Good luck!!
I retest Mon, and just feel like it's better to know and take care if it so baby is ok, plus its just gestational, so it'll go away after delivery...

Thank you so much ladies. Im taking a deep breath and will calm down and just wait For the results. I really hope everything is ok. Ive had a bad pregnancy and i feel like its still getting worse... You ladies make me feel like im not alone so thank you so much..
I also was told I am anemic and failed my 1 hour with a 162. My 3 hour test came back fine. Good luck!

Me too! I'm anemic and faked my 1hr with a 156. The day off my 1hr I was told I could eat protein but stay away from fruits, sugar, carbs, etc. Well I ate eggs and sausage and failed! For the three hour I was told to not eat or drink anything after midnight...so after dinner at 8p...I ate nothing. By time my 3hr was complete around 1230p the next day...I was starving! But the outcome was a passing 3hr! I'm still anemia and gladly taking my iron. Life doesn't end of you fall this test, stay positive and good luck on your 3hr.
my 1 hr was 156 and I passed the 3 hr test. good luck!

question: I failed my glucose test. And on top of that they said im anemic too. .. Both blood test came back abnormal.... I guess its suppose to be no higher than 130 mines was 154 and I have to go back Tuesday to take a 3 hr glucose and get blood drawn every hour for 4 hours. Im so sad and im freaking out... Im currently 28+6... Is anyone going through this too.. What do i do? Im so scared I will fail again!
title: Im so scared!!!!! help please..
